website_summaries.verdict: Works to effectively clean all kinds of surfaces, and it also delivers a pleasant scent.
pros: Doesn't require a lot of scrubbing to remove grime
Offers more cleaning power than other brands of natural cleaners
Does a good job of eliminating germs and viruses
cons: Doesn't work well on stainless steel, as it'll leave streaks
May leave a residue on surfaces

customer_reviews.title: Smells Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This smells like an expensive perfume which I love. The whole kitchen smells amazing after using it. It seems to remove all the grease and dirt from the counter and stove as well. I prefer to use natural cleaning supply that isn’t toxic so this is a good option. I was surprised by the bottle size as they are huge and you get two. Would absolutely buy again. My only problem is that one bottle had burn stains inside the lid and it smelled really bad. I emailed Trinova about this and hopefully it’s safe to use. The second bottle didn’t have any issues and I am overall very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: jo

customer_reviews.title: Smells great and more importantly it WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: My husband was the first to try this product out. As the maintenance supervisor to a large apartment complex, he has used his share of cleaning chemicals over the years. He was very impressed with this cleaner! He fell in love with the scent, he called it "pleasant" and "appealing" and he was also impressed that it worked well. We used it on all sorts of things, walls, floors, kitchen, toilet, and more! Very satisfied with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Scent lasts for a while
customer_reviews.text: Cleaned the all season floor mats in my truck, sprayed, hosed down, no scrubbing. Wiped down the cup holders (just in case). The only problem now, is that there's a very feminine smell lingering, which is fine. . . kind of (but not really).
customer_reviews.author: Khandaq

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well
customer_reviews.text: You can't beat the price for what you get. I recently received this and it cleans really well. I am happy about that. Why I left one star off is because of the scent. I didn't care for it when using it but figured it would dissipate fairly soon. Wrong! Two days later and I still smell it..my nose is affected and migraines seem to love it. My cat has asthma and he is bothered. Not sure what I can do about the scent...wonder if I can add something to the liquid. :(
customer_reviews.author: L. Connell

customer_reviews.title: Leaky bottles and a heavy perfume smell
customer_reviews.text: Both bottles came with the plastic caps on tightly, but the seal on each bottle had let loose. I think a small amount of product may have leaked out, but there was a nice microfiber cloth that had soaked up any leakage. The other thing I really disliked was the scent of the product. It had a very heavy, cloying perfume scent that did not smell fresh or natural at all. I couldn’t stand to even have the open package in my house. Returned it and will look for something else.
customer_reviews.author: MichiganMom2Boys

customer_reviews.title: Great, non-toxic cleaner for everywhere!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, non-toxic cleaner that's good even for glass surfaces and doesn't leave streaks. It's even better than Seventh Generation cleaner (which leaves streaks on glass). If you need a deep cleaning, as with any cleaning solution, spray some extra on the stain area and let it sit for a while before wiping it away. Many people don't do this, then complain about how the cleaning solution is bad. I haven't tried it in the bathroom areas, but for the kitchen, dining room, living room, etc. it's great and great that it's non-toxic so it's safe to use around small children or pets.
customer_reviews.author: VY

customer_reviews.title: Great Cleaner with a Lovely Scent
customer_reviews.text: I am sensitive to the chemical smell of commercial cleaners. My housekeeper usually uses harsh products such as Tilex. When her crew began cleaning for me she wasn’t happy with other natural cleaners I tried. Eventually, I bought this one, and she says it does as well as other multipurpose commercial products. I find the scent light and refreshing. I wish the company would make an air freshener with the same smell as Tri Nova’s Multi-purpose cleaner. FYI it does not work on mold as Tilex does. Nor does it claim that it does. You can replace, at least, a half dozen of your other products.
customer_reviews.author: Mona-Alisa

customer_reviews.title: Leaking bottles on arrival
customer_reviews.text: Received product quickly BUT one bottle leaked in the plastic bag and the included towel soaked up most of the leakage. Still lost about 2 inches of my product. Not really happy with ingredients in the product but will use what I have and NOT purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: atticmom

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I will definitely be buying this item again as well as recommending it. I use it for kitchen and bathroom countertops, floors and the interior hard surfaces of my car. The smell is amazing and 90% of people who get into my car immediately compliment how good it smells. And while the fragrance lingers, it's not overbearing. When I tell folks that it's natural and organic, they want to know where to get it. I love this product. I've found the one cleaner I'll be sticking with.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Not organic, strong scent.
customer_reviews.text: We choose to try this brand over our usual cleaner solely because the title started this product is organic at the time of purchase. I hope they change the description title. We paid more for it becauseit said Organic. However, upon receiving this item, it was evident it is not organic anywhere on the label and the scent was so strong and smelled more toxic than the brand we regularly use which is also natural and proven to kill bacteria but costs less. We are glad to have a refund but returns are annoying as our nearest UPS store is over half an hour drive one way.
customer_reviews.author: Heather J L

customer_reviews.title: Bought again,  very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It is the only cleaner I have found that doesn’t give me a headache after use. I feel good knowing we are using a product which is safer for everyone’s health yet is still cleaning the surface. As other customers (and the company) have said, you may need to buff after you wipe but to me this extra effort is so worth it for peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Smells terrible
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely hate this product. I was so excited about it. You get a lot for the price. And I read great things about the scent. But the scent is awful. It smells like perfume. I was hoping for a fresh natural scent. Not something that smells like I sprayed a ton of perfume in my apartment. And the scent lingers. It gave me the worst migraine. Outside of the scent, it works ok. It’s a little thin and takes awhile to dry. But I truly can’t get past the smell. What a waste of product and money.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Grace

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Long love love. I’m so picky about cleaner but I really want to use a safe and natural product. I thoroughly enjoy this one and my husband enjoys it as well. We love the scent. It is nice and clean and fresh. It works great too! On grease, crumbs, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Fresh smell and a great clean!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on a recommendation from a podcast (“It smells like an expensive hotel,” they said, which was enough to sell me), and let me tell you, it’s changed the game as far as my everyday cleaning routine goes. My counters have never been so spotless, it smells amazing, and the size of the bottles is a terrific value for the price (embarrassing admission time: when I purchased this, I thought I was buying one bottle, so I was flabbergasted when two AND a microfiber towel showed up!). In addition to all that, it’s just really nice to know that my cleaning products aren’t potentially harmful to my family or the environment. Thanks, TriNova!
customer_reviews.author: Rosie F

customer_reviews.title: Cleans great - smells AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I love this cleaner! Not only does is work amazing well on *everything* I've tried it on so far, it smells so good it's actually inspiring me to clean. I've considered buying and shipping it to members of my family I love it so much, but that just felt weird, so I didn't. Places I have used it so far: my bathroom, to clean the gunk off my gas stove, to clean out the sink (which I usually have to use CLR on because of our hard water), countertops, and other random places. Haven't found anyplace yet that it won't work. And, I feel great that is a natural cleaning product. Would definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Margo Stedman

customer_reviews.title: Very good cleaner with wonderful scent and natural !
customer_reviews.text: Smells great, light clean scent. I put it to the test in the kitchen on greasy stove and doors etc and it performed much better than I expected. I especially love this company because you get the microfiber towel with a few of the products. So far the products I have tried are awesome, so of course I keep trying others :)
customer_reviews.author: Watch Enthusiast

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff, came with loose cap/damaged seal.
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff, as are all other TriNova products. However when my order arrived one of the bottles had a damaged seal and loose cap which allowed a slow leak such that about an inch of the cleaner had leaked out and was absorbed by the included microfiber cloth, it was drenched. The other bottle was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mac Guy

customer_reviews.title: Large bottles , smells amazing
customer_reviews.text: This cleaner smells fabulous and the bottles are large. In a time that locating housecleaaner can be tough , I am happy with this product. It works well on most items except glass . It can leave glass a bit streaky. However , the size , smell and no chemicals in this product outweigh its effects on glass.
customer_reviews.author: Dobergirl77

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that this product is natural, organic, & non-toxic. It smells amazing! Not like anything I've smelled before. I find after a couple of days when I walk into a room where I used it that I can still smell it. It works like an all purpose cleaner should. I will be ordering this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Brian P.

customer_reviews.title: I really like this scent
customer_reviews.text: I have a sensitivity to strong smells, but this one is just right. It is not overpowering, but does leave the area smelling fresh and clean. My bathroom countertop gets a bit sticky with hairspray and this powered thru and I didn't have to clean the area more than once. Good stuff!
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaner, light pleasant fragrance
customer_reviews.text: I really love this cleaner. I use it mainly for cleaning my quartz countertops in the kitchen & bathrooms. I love the scent and it does a great job. Most other cleaners I’ve tried have overpowering scents that I can’t tolerate but Trinova’s scent is better than the others & my countertops shine. Great stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Rapkin

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful welcoming scent
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this all purpose cleaner. The smell is not over whelming , very pleasant scent especially in my bathroom; which I clean daily. The only problem I have is how the products are shipped. Twice already the bottles are somehow leaking & the micofiber cloth was totally soaked. Very odd how the bottles are leaking because once I unscrew the top to insert the sprayer; the seal on both bottles are intact. Not punctured in anyway. However, more than a third of the liquid of both bottles have leaked.
customer_reviews.author: Norma

customer_reviews.title: Spray on carpet stain, walk away for 10 minutes, voila’ stain is gone!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great! Nearly a miracle...especially with pet stains! I judge cleaners on how easy it is to get stains up...with this, spray on, walk away for 10 minutes, come back and voila’, the stain is gone!
customer_reviews.author: Someone Along the Nez Perce Trail

customer_reviews.title: Smells good, looks good, works well.
customer_reviews.text: It smells divine. Someone else said it smells like an expensive perfume and they're right! The other thing I like about it is that the design is unoffensive and I like that it's not an obnoxious neon color. It probably sounds ridiculous to care how your counter spray looks, but it matters to me. I don't have to hide the bottle under my sink. I don't mind leaving it out on the counter of my warm-colored, mostly brown kitchen. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: P. J. Hazel

customer_reviews.title: Natural cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I like this product because it doesn't emit a harsh chemical smell like previous cleaners I have used. I use this for cleaning the floors. Works great. I've bought this product twice, so I'm a happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong scent
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about this cleaner. I saw the reviews saying it taste like an expensive perfume I get a bad headache from the scent and the scent is very strong But I have to say that it cleans very well and I will keep it and just open the windows after cleaning
customer_reviews.author: Montana123

customer_reviews.title: Does a good job but very strong smelling
customer_reviews.text: The cleaner appears to do a fine job of getting things clean, but I find the smell is overpowering. I can smell it on my hands a long time after using it. I would prefer a subtle aroma.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ventura

customer_reviews.title: Really Good All Purpose Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I've not been able to use the new TriNova Natural All Purpose Cleaner a lot, but when I, or my wife have, we've been satisfied. Has a nice pleasant smell, not chemically, and it has been able to cut through whatever we've thrown at it. We've used it on our stove top, our counter tops, our bathroom, our hardwood floors, and our cabinets. Does it's job. I feel ok letting my kids use this. You also get two very large bottles for the price so it's a good value. Try it out and put away the poison!
customer_reviews.author: Luke S.

customer_reviews.title: My cleaner of choice
customer_reviews.text: Smells AMAZING. Safe and healthy. Absolutely love this product and this brand. I wish it cleaned a tiny bit better, but hey. Hard to keep up with those harsh chemicals. This is my cleaning product of choice. Really like their dish soap too.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Smells like old cigars
customer_reviews.text: Smell was like cigars, set off my asthma and did nothing on soap scum. Other than that it was fine. Sent it back out of principle.
customer_reviews.author: Thefirefly

customer_reviews.title: Did it work?!
customer_reviews.text: So I like the perfume smell . It’s light and not overwhelming. But I’m not sure if it cleans better than my homemade vinegar one :/ . I don’t see or feel a huge difference. So in the end, it’s like I bought a high-end perfume infused water-down cleaning solution.
customer_reviews.author: Kaikai

customer_reviews.title: OBSESSED!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am OBSESSED with this cleaning spray & I swear I clean more bc I love it so much! Smells AMAZING, and cleans GREAT! with dirtier areas I let it sit on the surface a little longer and it wipes tough areas with dried food etc, no problem! The cloth works great but the product works just as well with any cleaning rag. Works surprisingly well on stainless steel too! LOVE LOVE LOVE !!
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: A cleaner with light pleasant smell that also does the job
customer_reviews.text: It smells quite pleasant and cleans very well. The scent does fade after a while if you’re looking for a fairly neutral scent after a day. For tougher jobs, letting it sit helps quite a bit or some extra scrubbing might be needed.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Love This!
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell! And that it is all natural. I use around my kids and on the floor, counters, and bathrooms!
customer_reviews.author: Georgia

customer_reviews.title: Delivered open....least I know it smells great
customer_reviews.text: Cleaner was delivered slightly open, luckily it was in a plastic bag and didn’t soak the entire box. Smells great!
customer_reviews.author: Elleveeh

customer_reviews.title: Great clean and great smell
customer_reviews.text: The smell of this stuff is amazing and the kicker is that it actually works! It lasts a lot longer than my other chemical filled cleaners and I feel better about using it in my house. I have this on subscription order.
customer_reviews.author: kranzie10

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product!
customer_reviews.text: Packing was cool, I like how everything is recyclable. As far as cleaning ability goes, this stuff works just as well as any other product which contain harsh or even harmful, chemicals. Smells amazing, and the price is awesome. I will certainly be purchasing more.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Is NOT effective cleaner. Method brand is better for me.
customer_reviews.text: Works ok but not as effective as other all purposes cleaners I used. Method brand works better. If you miss a spot where you sprayed, it leaves white flakes everywhere. I won’t buy it again. The pump works ok and smells nice but you don’t buy the cleaner for that purpose. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: NICHOLAS

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I love how well this product and the included cloth clean all kinds of surfaces. Everything is left clean and not filmy, and I absolutely love the scent. I will be purchasing again!
customer_reviews.author: J. Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Love to try new products
customer_reviews.text: This all purpose cleaner is what we were looking for. It smells great and does the job. We have been trying out companies that use more natural ingredients and was surprised that Trinova made a great spray for all surfaces. It smells great and would love more scents in the future. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: a92r

customer_reviews.title: Smells Wonderful & It cleans!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this cleanser since July and will not use anything else. One bottle is in the kitchen , the other in the upstairs bath. Like the other reviews, the whole house smells wonderful after I clean. It handles any cleaning job very well. I will be re-ordering!
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Really great product
customer_reviews.text: We've used it to clean tables, counters, lamps, walls, you name it! It has worked each and every time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Love the sprays and the smell. The biggest factor in my purchase was that it was non toxic and multi surface. I really like it!
customer_reviews.author: J.F.

customer_reviews.title: Cleaned my bathroom well, is not toxic and smells really nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because I wanted to clean my bathroom without being exposed to the toxins in usual cleaners. It did a good job at cleaning the floor, countertops and toilet, although deep, long-standing stains remained. It also smells really nice. It came with a sprayer top that works well. I'm very happy with this product given it's non-toxicity.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Letitia

customer_reviews.title: The scent is so lovely
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful all purpose cleaner. I've used it on cabinets, tables and countertops. It cleans well and has a very pleasant scent, not too strong yet not too light. A lot of all purpose cleaners work best when you spray the product and allow it to sit for at least 2 minutes before wiping down.
customer_reviews.author: Tonie

customer_reviews.title: Smells good! Cleans great!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this cleaner it’s natural and it smells so amazing so have used it for everything just about. I will definitely be buying more very soon.
customer_reviews.author: Dwayzha Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cleaner for my daughter that was moving into her college apartment and was amazed, not only the fresh clean smell but the way it left everything so clean, no smudges on furniture or glass tables, so I had to purchase one for myself. I love it and would recommend to those that are like myself very sensitive to smells and the use of chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Alie

customer_reviews.title: Great Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Love this cleaner! I bought it for my counter tops but is also a great stainless steel cleaner. Most stainless steel cleaners are greasy and toxic. The scent is natural and not over powering. Will be buying this again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We use Trinova Natural All Purpose Cleaner Organic - Multi Surface Cleaning Spray for cleaning all surfaces in our home. It does an excellent job of cleaning counter tops, sinks, and bath tubs, all without that harsh chemical smell. Trinova Natural All Purpose Cleaner Organic - Multi Surface Cleaning Spray smells good and it cleans very well....what else do you need?
customer_reviews.author: Racer Randy

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done, but takes awhile!
customer_reviews.text: Like that it is plant based; as I am highly sensitive to many chemicals. Does effective job at cleaning all surfaces. Howevever, takes, an unusually long time to dry. Scent not offensive, but not pleasant or fresh smelling.
customer_reviews.author: Carol S.

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Didn’t receive the sprayer nozzles or cloth, but my order was refunded. I love the simple safe ingredient list, and the smell is amazing. Will definitely purchase again when I run out!
customer_reviews.author: britnee

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Stuff
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great as a de-greaser for our grill and general house cleaner! Smells great! To bad it is out of stock want to order more.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: gentle but very effective cleaning
customer_reviews.text: I saw a video on FB about this product and thought I'd give it a try, I'm always on the lookout for a non-toxic but effective cleaning product. We used it on granite, stainless steel, painted walls, and it was great. Takes off greasy fingerprints with very little rubbing. And smells good, too.
customer_reviews.author: janet tipple

customer_reviews.title: Smells great, cleans well- though streaks mirrors and great price
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy the scent of the spray- while it’s lightly floral, it is not over-bearingly so. The smell does linger for quite a while and while that is awesome for me, may not be desirable by others. Cleaning wise, so far it has worked over every surface I have used it on: plastic tables, counter tops, sink, bathroom. Only down fall is it is VERY streaky on mirrors, but the company already disclosed this as well. Price wise, it’s great as you get two bottles!
customer_reviews.author: Shawna Newberg

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Love that it comes in packs of two. I always put one in the kitchen and one in the bathroom. Smells so good and works on everything. My go to cleaner for my household.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse R

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff
customer_reviews.text: this is great really cleans well, I use it on stainless steel fridge, stove as well as granite countertops door knobs, microwave door. The best cleaner without chemicals I have ever used .The smell was not great but I will definitely be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: jo

customer_reviews.title: No ce smelling cleaner.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an affordable cleaner for daily clean ups. Non toxic is a plus and I loved the provided cloth (nice perk) !
customer_reviews.author: Gail A.

customer_reviews.title: Great for pet owners
customer_reviews.text: Really like this cleaner. Feel good about using this in my home with my beloved pets. Even use it on my hard wood floors.
customer_reviews.author: chilldoc

customer_reviews.title: Finally a Cleaner I Like!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this stuff. Grease is no match for this, it smells great, does not smell like chemicals. This stuff really cleans.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, amazing, amazing
customer_reviews.text: I can’t express how happy I am that I found this cleaner! It leaves your home smelling amazing, works perfectly on stains and truly is a multi surface cleaner. I have used this on glass, as well as countertops and it works like a charm. Highly recommended, I literally stalked this product until it was restocked and then made sure I subscribed to make sure I’ll receive my supply! Awesome job TriNova.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria perera

customer_reviews.title: Smells great and safe around kids
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell! It’s similar to Peony scent, a very subtle floral I’d say. Knowing that this product is safe around pets and children just makes it perfect.
customer_reviews.author: trishh12

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaner and smells great!
customer_reviews.text: The all natural cleaner was way more then I expected. I have tried many "natural" cleaners and none seem to clean very well. This cleaner is better then clorox and doesn't have the nasty smell and harmful qualities either. Truly cleans really well. I will continue to purchase this from here on out.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Burrow

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this product! Works great, smells amazing and is safe for my babies! I use it in every room for everything! I even use to to wash my hard wood floors and it works great! I would definitely recommend. And the best part is it is also very affordable!
customer_reviews.author: Kim R.

customer_reviews.title: Smells Great
customer_reviews.text: I really love the fresh scent it leaves. The clean is smooth and removes stains on my tile floors, granite table tops and appliances and tv stands. I would recommend this safe and environmental free product ro anyone who ask."
customer_reviews.author: Melissa King

customer_reviews.title: Love product, will buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of allergies, but this product does not affect me in a negative way. I use it to clean sinks, door knobs etc. Very pleased with the product and it's my second time buying it
customer_reviews.author: Lynnore Acey

customer_reviews.title: Safe to use around pets!
customer_reviews.text: All of this brand of organic cleaning products is wonderful. They have a nice mild sent, clean everything I've used it on. But best of all ... Ir is not toxic or harmful to my Service dog!
customer_reviews.author: Robin Lynn Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time using an all natural cleaner and I was not disappointed. The smell is very nice and I’m so impressed with how well it cleans. Thank you for this amazing product that I can feel safe using around my family.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great All-Purpose Cleaner That Really Works For Me
customer_reviews.text: Used this for the bathroom (everything!) and it works as advertised. Really great all-purpose cleaner. It smells great also. Definitely recommend for others to give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unmatched
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes organic cleaning supplies can be sketch - not this one. I was seriously blown away by the cleaning power of this product and its smell! It smells amazing. I am the manager of a juice bar, so it gets sticky and messy really quickly - this spray is the first cleaning spray that I have found that I will keep in supply!
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful All Purpose Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE the Natural All Purpose Cleaner! I use it at home, in my office and have now convinced at lease 5 others to buy/use it!! The scent is just lovely, and the cleaning power is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smell is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love that this product is all natural since I have a young baby in the house. The smell is amazing and I have gotten compliments from lots of visitors to my house. The only drawback I have noticed is the residue/streaks it leaves behind on my kitchen countertops. You can only see them in certain lighting, but I do wish they weren't there.
customer_reviews.author: Jedediah

customer_reviews.title: It’s natural nontoxic..
customer_reviews.text: The reason I bought and tried Natural all Purpose Cleaner Organic of it natural ingredients...I’ve been using it every day to clean my kitchen counter top, the vinyl table covers, inside my microwave..because it’s nontoxic I feel it’s safe to use without worrying it affects my health being
customer_reviews.author: En Vu

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Not all natural products work very well but this works exceptionally well in my bathroom & shower walls.
customer_reviews.author: Dari Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Cleans easily with no chemicals, fresh scent. Spray on, wipe off. Couldn't be easier
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It has worked well cleaning different surfaces. I love the fact there are no harsh chemicals. The fresh scent it leaves is also wonderful. This product is my go to cleaning product. I no longer have to use chemical cleaners to clean and freshen my home.
customer_reviews.author: Kittkatt

customer_reviews.title: Smell Great, Work Well
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell and they clean well. The bottles are also decent quality and don't feel like they are likely to break (I don't know if it's just us, but we break our spray bottles a lot)
customer_reviews.author: Ayla

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, I enjoy using it and it does a terrific job of cleaning. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kae S.

customer_reviews.title: Natural cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Smells great and it works to clean sticky surfaces. So far I’ve used it only in the kitchen and it’s a success. The ingredients that make up this product are what drove me to give it a try. Take a look and try it for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: AlessandroP

customer_reviews.title: Great chemical free all-purpose cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: I have spots on my quartz countertop, as I found out that it's covered in a plastic like film when finished. This is the only product that won't ruin them and actually makes them look really good!
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Pokrak

customer_reviews.title: Clean and fresh
customer_reviews.text: Smells like the outdoors, clean and fresh. Delivery was as scheduled.
customer_reviews.author: Avscott

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This cleaner smells amazing, and works great! Just spray and wipe, or let sit on tougher grime. I use it in the bathrooms and kitchen. Really can’t say enough good things about it.
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: Smell good and effective
customer_reviews.text: Smell good and do the job! Makes me happy to know my kids can handle and use them safely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: We just got a puppy who has accidents, I have been using this after I pick up the pee. It cleans good, and leaves a nice scent. I also used it for dusting and on grease. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great smelling, works well.
customer_reviews.text: This is a natural product that works well on my countertops. It doesn't cut grease as well as something with stronger chemicals, but it does work well for just daily cleanups. Smells great.
customer_reviews.author: A. Ishikawa

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: The all purpose cleaner works well on a variety of surfaces. A little streaking on mirrors but they said that it would. I got the glass cleaner later and it works great on mirrors.
customer_reviews.author: S. Manne

customer_reviews.title: Cleans it all!
customer_reviews.text: Moving into a house that needs some serious cleaning I like that I can use all purpose cleaner for everything It does a good job and smells "clen"
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A Hill

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Cuts grease and cleans very well with just one swipe! Smells great!
customer_reviews.author: Janette

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the smell of this all purpose cleaner, and it is very effective too! It's perfect for anyone with sensitivites.
customer_reviews.author: Fordhood

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaner, love the scent
customer_reviews.text: I really like this cleaner; I use it on most surfaces and haven’t had any issues. I especially like to use it on my little one’s high chair or in areas where my pets hang out (kennels, etc).
customer_reviews.author: Beba

customer_reviews.title: Smells great, natural ingredients
customer_reviews.text: Love the scent and the natural ingredients. Will definitely reorder! Sometimes I need a more powerful cleaner for bathroom grout in shower or grease on stove top . Use everyday in kitchen on counters, and sometimes in bathroom sinks/ counters.
customer_reviews.author: adjnc

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: This product smells amazing!! it works on everything! It even cleans grease! Spray it on the stove and wipe off no need to spray and scrub multiple times! I prefer this over my Method cleaners!
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Davis

customer_reviews.title: Green Clean
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful scent Kid Friendly in which I love. My kid has a burn and it did not irritate her skin or mines. Not only good for cleaning but it doesn’t harm us or surrounding.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Smells clean
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this cleaner. Makes my kitchen smell great.
customer_reviews.author: DianaB

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, love that it’s all natural, and has a great smell. The smell is kind of strong but not in a bad way. Will buy again for all my household cleaning needs!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells incredible
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed with the scent and absolutely love that I can use it on everything in my home!! Safe for pets and kids
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Great for granite
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping get rids of several different cans of cleaning products and just have the one bottle. Does great for granite. Not pleased with the product on stainless . Streaks.
customer_reviews.author: sondra barrow

customer_reviews.title: Natural but works!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! I am often skeptical of natural products, does it really work, does it actually disinfect??? This product seems to do both. I am overall very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Angelea Storey

customer_reviews.title: Great new product
customer_reviews.text: Item exactly as pictured. Love the scent of this. Cleans well with being sticky or leaving a tacky residue.
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: Such amazing Scent
customer_reviews.text: I was upset that my husband ordered this without knowing the scent.....but I was so happy once I opened the bottle and started cleaning my kitchen....my entire house smells so elegant and clean. Love it....definitely buy it!
customer_reviews.author: JCJ

customer_reviews.title: Great product and value!
customer_reviews.text: I love the scent and it works REALLY well! The bottles were nice and big and the spray tips came separately so there was no leaking. The microfiber towel is great quality and huge! It all came in one medium small clear plastic bag, I like the minimal packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Vern

customer_reviews.title: Do a good job with nice scent
customer_reviews.text: Feel so good to using this natural plant based product. The scent is a pleasure, and it cleans well.
customer_reviews.author: Kuo Winnie

product_meta.title: Natural All Purpose Cleaner Organic - Multi Surface Cleaning Spray for Safe Kitchen, Bathroom, Toy, Stain Removal, Counter, Wall. Non Toxic for Kids and Pets. 32oz 2-Pack 64 oz
feature_bullets: ✅ SOME NATURAL CLEANERS don't work - they are weak or they leave streaks or streaking. Our multisurface product is a necesarry supply for your household because it works on glass, toilet, floor, home, countertops, and more. DON'T WORRY about getting a weak spray that can't actually tackle the mess that life brings your way.

✅ WANT YOUR HOME TO SMELL GREAT? If you're looking for lemon verbana, grapefruit, or basic house supplies you won't find them here. OUR CUSTOM SCENT is a totally unique blend of white tea and thyme extract. Here's a preview of you smelling it: "OH WOW - THAT'S NICE!" Don't believe me? Go ahead and buy a bottle and if you don't like it we'll just give you your money back!

✅ NEED A PRODUCT THAT WORKS IN EVERY ROOM? Your best stuff deserves a specialized cleaner - that's what we believe. We make specific products for every surface, but we're also not naive. Sometimes you need a bottle of cleaning spray that can come from your kitchen to your bathroom to clean walls, floors, oven, countertop, quartz and you want an eco friendly version that works better than some multipurpose stuff from a less than honest company. We're here for you.

✅ GREEN PRODUCTS SHOULDN'T COST A FORTUNE. We are including 2 bottles of 32oz so you can clean your house for weeks on end - even if you have children that don't understand the word "no." And because we don't want you throwing away rolls and rolls of paper towels (well, maybe one roll - kids are impossible) we're including a premium microfiber towel. You're welcome. So buy it now or subscribe and save to get it delivered every month.

✅ THE BEST PART? We're 100% customer focused, so even if the product is on sale as the deal of the day or even if you get it for free - we want you to be satisfied. If that's not the case, get in touch and you'll have a hassle-free experience with our dedicated customer care team.
